Rerolling isn't appealing - those Jokers aren't a great fit. Selling a Joker is also completely out of the question since they are all high-value. Using The Sun is no good.

Okay, so the Blank Voucher it is. I'm going to buy that first.

I also considered Joker placement - making sure that the order of the mult/chip boosters is correct - so my current scoring is: cards played -> Scholar triggers -> Shoot the Moon triggers -> Shoot the Moon Holo Mult applies. Not that the order matters since I have additive mult.
